INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES(.)
add_library(zlib STATIC
        crc32.h
        deflate.h
        inffast.h
        inffixed.h
        inflate.h
        inftrees.h
        trees.h
        zconf.h
        zlib.h
        zutil.h
        adler32.c
        compress.c
        crc32.c
        deflate.c
        gzio.c
        infback.c
        inffast.c
        inflate.c
        inftrees.c
        trees.c
        uncompr.c
        zutil.c
        )
target_link_libraries(zlib)
